interface.help: Outgoing interface for GENEVE encapsulated traffic.
interface.name: interface

ip-version.help: IP version to use for the GENEVE interface and so for communication over the GENEVE. IPv4 or IPv6 unicast.
ip-version.name: ip-version

options.help: Use IPv4 unicast addressing over the GENEVE.
options.name: ipv4-unicast

options.help: Use IPv6 unicast addressing over the GENEVE.
options.name: ipv6-unicast

name.help: GENEVE device or interface name. Must be an unique interface name.
name.name: name

remote-ip.help: IPv4 address of the GENEVE interface on the device at the remote end of the GENEVE.
remote-ip.name: remote-ip

remote-ip6.help: IPv6 IP address of the GENEVE interface on the device at the remote end of the GENEVE.
remote-ip6.name: remote-ip6
